posts.post_content: [Elvish Champion](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Elvish Champion) affects all Elves controlled by all players, so if you're playing with someone else with an elf deck then 1 is enough to make even your teammates have forest walk.

Posted By: Duskdale_Wurm (3/25/2011 2:59:13 AM)
Rating:

posts.post_content:
Currently the worst voted elf, because, ya know, [Elvish Champion](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Elvish Champion)  
  
Well, Elvish Champion can't give herself or your partners' (i.e. two headed giant) elves forestwalk, now can she? Also, if for some reason you were playing a not green elf deck and you wanted to simply splash green, this guy would be easier to include.  
  
If you ever find yourself needing to do one of those things then this is the card for you  
  
not likely because if you are playing two headed giant with someone else with an elf deck, they probably have [Elvish Champion](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Elvish Champion)s of their own, and who would only *splash* green in an elf deck?
posts.html:
Currently the worst voted elf, because, ya know, Elvish Champion

Well, Elvish Champion can't give herself or your partners' (i.e. two headed giant) elves forestwalk, now can she? Also, if for some reason you were playing a not green elf deck and you wanted to simply splash green, this guy would be easier to include.

If you ever find yourself needing to do one of those things then this is the card for you

not likely because if you are playing two headed giant with someone else with an elf deck, they probably have Elvish Champions of their own, and who would only splash green in an elf deck?

Certainly one of the worst cards of all time. Although it doesn't do /nothing/ so it isn't a 0.5 card like say, wood elemental, it is still pure garbage.
